ABOUT.company: This application is designed, built and maintained by [Restaurant Developments Ltd]({{ web }}) © {{ year }}.

core.msgDataChange:
Thank you.  

We have received your change request and this will be reviewed by the curation
team and updated accordingly.  

Please be aware that you may not see any changes for up to 24 hours.

spw.headerContentRequired: We need a bit more content
spw.msgContentRequired:
Good work so far but we need a bit more information to generate your Single Page Website (SPW). 

The summary below should indicate which sections still need additional content. Once you've added enough data, the **PREVIEW** and **PUBLISH** options will be enabled and we can create your SPW and distribute your content to our partners.

You can [view a demo restaurant version]({{ link }}) top see what the SPW will look like with content added.
spw.msgPublished: Your **SPW** has been successfully published and has been synchronised with all Restaurant Collective content subscribers. You can view your page or copy the URL using the MARKETING LINK options below.
spw.msgUnpublished:
The latest changes that you have made have not yet been published. 

**PREVIEW** your SPW to check and verify your content. If everything is correct then press **PUBLISH** to synchronise with all {{ brand }} distribution channels.
spw.msgVerified: Verified and published on {{ date }} by {{ name }}.

summary.statusMenus: {{ pdf }} active pdf menus & {{ dish }} sample dishes

FEATURES.labelDescFull: A full description up to {{ chars }} characters max.
FEATURES.labelDescParagraph: A one paragraph desciption, 200 characters max.
FEATURES.labelDescSentence: A one sentence description {{ chars }} characters max.
FEATURES.labelStrapline: Strapline (e.g. Restaurant & Bar) {{ chars }} characters maximum
FEATURES.tipAddFeatures: Add extra features here, separated by commas

HOURS.labelGeneral: Add general information about you opening times ({{ chars }} characters max)

IMAGES.msgConfirmDelete: You are about to delete **image {{ img }}**,  are you sure that you want to do that?
IMAGES.msgDefaultUpdated: The default image has been successfully updated
IMAGES.msgDeleted: Image {{ img }} has now been deleted

LINKS.infoCustomDomain:
The **SPW** can also be set up to work on a custom domain (e.g. www.your-domain.com). 

It can be an existing domain name, or we can register a suitable domain name for you. Contact the [Curation Team](mailto:{{ email }}) for further details.
LINKS.infoQRCodes:
**QR Codes** are special images that carry information about a website location. 

Most modern smartphone or tablet devices will recognise and decode these images, via their camera apps, and provide an option to visit the relevant web page directly.
LINKS.infoSpwLink:
The website link, or URL, above is a permanent link to the Single Page Website or **SPW** that is automatically generated by **Restaurant Collective**. 

This link can be shared with customers or partners via any digital medium.
LINKS.infoUsage:
Use these links in any 'offline' situation to provide an easy way for your customers to access the website, or menus, on their smartphone or tablet. 

You can copy the QR code to your computer using right-click or long-press on the image.
LINKS.tipQRCodeMenu: Download the MENU QR Code for {{ name }} which links users to the SPW Menu section.
LINKS.tipQRCodeWebsite: Download the QR Code for {{ name }} which links users to the SPW

LOCATION.infoDirectionsDownload: If you have a PDF map, or directions then you can make it available to your customers by uploading a copy here.
LOCATION.labelParking: Any parking available nearby ({{ chars }} characters max.)
LOCATION.labelPublicTransport: Trains, buses, stations etc.({{ chars }} characters max.)
LOCATION.msgNewCoords: Coordinates updated to latitude: {{ lat }} and longitude {{ lng }}.

MENUS.hintSection: For example Starters, Main Course or Lunch etc.
MENUS.infoSampleDishes:
Add a selection of your most popular dishes. We would recommend that you choose a cross-section of your price range and dishes that best reflect your style of food. You can display the dishes as 
![Vegetarian]({{ icon.veg }}) **Vegetarian**, 
![Vegan]({{ icon.vegan }}) **Vegan** or 
![Gluten Free]({{ icon.gluten }}) **Gluten Free** when you add them.
MENUS.labelMenuGenInfo: Add any general information about the menus ({{ max }} characters max.)
MENUS.msgConfirmDeleteMenu: You are about to delete the PDF menu **{{ item }}** – are you sure that's what you want to do?
MENUS.msgRemoveFromMenu: You are about to delete **{{ item }}** from the menu, is that what you want to do?
MENUS.msgRemovedFromMenu: {{ item }} has been deleted from the menu

RESERVATIONS.labelGeneral: General information about reservations ({{ chars }} characters max.)
RESERVATIONS.labelGroupPolicy: What is your policy regarding group bookings (max. {{ max }} characters)?
RESERVATIONS.labelPrivate: Do you offer any private dining options (max. {{ max }} characters) ?
RESERVATIONS.msgNoOnlineBookings: Please ensure that you complete the **General** information section, giving details of how customers can book in advance, outlining your policy regarding reservations and including any special telephone numbers etc.
RESERVATIONS.msgNoTest: This service does not require testing - it does not have an associated URL

UPLOAD.errorExceedsMax: That file exceeds the maximum size that can be uploaded.

CONFIRM.msgConfirmCancel: The changes you have made have not yet been saved and will be lost if you continue. Do you want to discard changes and continue?

JOIN.joinSuccess:
# Ok thanks!

A member of our Support & Curation Team will be in contact with you shortly.

**{{ brand }} Curation Team**
JOIN.joinUsByReferral:
# Join us{{ referrer }}

You've been invited by {{ referrer }} to become part of {{ brand }}, an exciting new organisation that has been exclusively created to support both independent and group restaurants, and affect positive change within the industry. To join us:

 1. Provide your name and contact details

 2. Select your subscription option

 3. Pay your subscription online

If you experience any problems activating your membership then do please [contact our Support Team]({{ email }}).
JOIN.joinUsToday:
# Join us!

Just complete the following 3 steps and you'll soon be part of an exciting organisation:

 1. Provide your name and contact details

 2. Select your subscription option

 3. Pay your subscription online

If you experience any problems activating your membership then do please [contact our Support Team]({{ email }}).
JOIN.joinWelcome:
# Welcome

You've successfully registered yourself as a **Member** and we've sent you login details and along with some further information.

Close this window and check your email.

Many thanks.

**{{ brand }} Curation Team**
JOIN.msgCheckEmail: Check your email for sign in credentials

MARKETPLACE.msgRequest:
## {{ deal }}

If you would like to take advantage of this exclusive Member offer, or would like to know a bit more about it, confirm your interest below.

We will forward your contact details and Member ID to **{{ affiliate }}** and they will contact you within 2 working days with further details.

This is just to register you interest and there's no obligation on your part to proceed, unless you decide to.

MEMBERSHIP.instructions:
Please select your preferred **{{ brand }}** subscription option.

You will be taken to the checkout stage, where you can review your subscription before paying securely online using your preferred method

If you have a **PROMOCODE** then you can apply it at the same time.
MEMBERSHIP.terms: Please take the time to read the [Terms of Membership]({{ terms }}) and [Privacy Policy]({{ privacy }}). By becoming a member of Restaurant Collective you are confirming your acceptance of these terms.

MESSAGES.welcomeNewMember:
# You're in!

It's great that you've chosen to join Restaurant Collective and we hope that you'll help us to grow this exciting community of industry professionals and independent restaurateurs.

## Add your restaurant

Before you start exploring the Member's Hub, please complete the initial set up by linking your restaurant to your membership account.

When you're ready, select the **START HERE** option below.

Find your restaurant and follow the on-screen instructions to verify the details and link it to your Membership.

If you need any help, then open the **Knowledge Base** and see the **Getting Started** guide.

** has not yet been curated. However, the team has now been notified and curation will take place within the next 48 hours.

SETTINGS.infoAvatar: Click the image add/edit and personalise your Membership details.

SETTINGS.infoReferrals: This is a unique referral code that you can share with any of your colleagues, to encourage them to join Restaurant Collective and be part of this exciting new organisation.

password.instructions: Your new password must be at least 8 characters long.

referral.instructions:
This is a personal referral code which you can send to your colleagues and associates to encourage them to join you in supporting **{{ brand }}**.

Copy the link and paste it into an email, text message, or to your Social Media of choice!

SETTINGS.tipAvatar: Upload an image to use as an avatar

SIGNIN.errorUserUnauthorised: Unauthorised login attempt - please check your details
SIGNIN.introduction:
# Let's work together

It’s time someone levelled the playing field for independent operators like you.

Welcome to the Restaurant Collective. We’re a member-owned, non-profit organisation on a mission.
We want to empower and champion independent hospitality operators.
SIGNIN.newPwdSent: A new password has been sent to your email address
SIGNIN.resetPwdInstructions: Enter your registered email address to reset your password. You may need to check your spam folder.
